Posts.EditableText: How to add background to squiffy? Also, can i change text color or add other visual effects?
Posts.HTML: How to add background to squiffy? Also, can i change text color or add other visual effects?

Posts.EditableText:
If you want to change the default background, or the default text color, you can edit the style.css file. See [url=http://forum.textadventures.co.uk/viewtopic.php?f=24&t=5990#p41430:12ukw84u]this post[/url:12ukw84u] for one way to do that.

If you just want to change the color of a word or two, you can use html in your Squiffy story, like this:

[code:12ukw84u]<span style="color:blue">This text will be blue.</span> This text will be the usual color.[/code:12ukw84u]

See [url=http://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_span.asp:12ukw84u]this page[/url:12ukw84u] for an example you can try.
